entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @OliverDowden Utter rubbish. Many people lost loved ones and did not get to see them one last time before they were put into the ground. You're defending an arrogant bastard who thinks he is above the laws around COVID19 lockdown that he helped to make and took the virus with him to Durham.
